BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Landmarks Preservation Commission designation no. DL - 344, LP - 2106, pursuant to §3020 of the New York City Charter, concerning the designation of the Former Childs Restaurant, located at 2101 Boardwalk (aka 3052-3078 West 21st Street, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 47, as a landmark.  (Non-ULURP no. 20035183 HKK).

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 030158 PSK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning site selection for a capital project to be located at 165 Cadman Plaza East, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 33.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.

This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
